item.description:
Hello all,

Well this is my version of the misfit toys - I have Easter open this year and I'd love to share my house and Easter dinner with all of you. So come on over, play some games, have some laughs and enjoy!

If you have an Easter side dish that you'd like to share with the group that would be great, just let me know so I can plan the menu. Snacks and Desserts are always welcome.

BYOB, Bring your favorite game that you'd like to play.

Don't forget the $1.00 for Nina to offset the meetup subscription.

Parking logistics: Please park in the emergency lane or the CVS parking lot. Please do not park in the front or side of my house.

For those that may have a dog allergy I have 1 super shedding dog.
item.why: If you have no place else to go on Easter, come on over for Easter dinner.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Easter at Margariiitttaaaasss
